original_text: Which was the son of Melea, which was the son of Menan, which was the son of Mattatha, which was the son of Nathan, which was the son of David,
korean_text: 그 위는 멜레아요 그 위는 멘나요 그 위는 맛다다요 그 위는 나단이요 그 위는 다윗이요

sentences.original_text: Which was the son of Melea,
which was the son of Menan,
which was the son of Mattatha,
which was the son of Nathan,
which was the son of David,
